title: Broccoli Revolution
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, International, Thai, Western, Juice bar, Fusion
description: Modern, casual-nice restaurant on two floors with high ceiling, Wi-Fi, and plenty of seating. Opened Sept 2015. All vegan except for honey in a few items. Varied dishes might include quinoa-broccoli burger, taro fries, pasta, vegan cakes. Little bit of English spoken. Dishes priced each 120-280 baht, juice 100-180 baht.
streetAddress: 899, Sukhumvit Rd, Khlong Tan, Krung Thep Maha Nakhon 10110
